text: Barack Obama and Angela Merkel met in Berlin to discuss climate policy. Later in the afternoon, Barack Obama met Angela Merkel again to review a joint statement on energy cooperation.
Angela Merkel and Emmanuel Macron held a summit in Paris to plan humanitarian aid. Emmanuel Macron thanked Angela Merkel while Barack Obama applauded from the audience during the same session.
Barack Obama and Emmanuel Macron coordinated transatlantic aid via a secure video link. Barack Obama told Emmanuel Macron that Angela Merkel would support the plan during their joint announcement.
Kamala Harris joined Angela Merkel to announce a new transatlantic innovation fund in Washington. Later, Kamala Harris phoned Emmanuel Macron to invite France to the launch summit.
Barack Obama, Kamala Harris, and Angela Merkel signed an agreement on renewable infrastructure. Emmanuel Macron and Ursula von der Leyen praised the coalition during a televised conference.
